meanings.sent1: The teacher was disappointed by the disrespectability shown by the students in class.
meanings.sent2: His disrespectful behavior towards his elders highlighted his disrespectability.
meanings.sent3: The disrespectability of the cat knocking over the vase was both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The disrespectability of the storm tearing through the town left a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The disrespectability of the toddler's tantrum was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disrespectful.
meanings.sent1: She was shocked by the disrespectability displayed during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The disrespectability of his actions was evident to everyone present.
meanings.sent3: The disrespectability of the dog stealing socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The disrespectability of the wind ripping the leaves off the trees was a powerful sight.
meanings.sent5: The disrespectability of the teenager's attitude was a cause for concern.
